# eslint/no-unreachable <Badge type="info" text="Nursery" />

<div class="rule-meta">
</div>

### What it does

Disallow unreachable code after `return`, `throw`, `continue`, and `break` statements

- [Rule Source](https://github.com/oxc-project/oxc/blob/45ef3eb2becc663e756a3da557df5a03fb40fd84/crates/oxc_linter/src/rules/eslint/no_unreachable.rs)
